Note: Please add a function that users can change anima size, direction, rotation, etc, like Wallpaper Engine. Many thank.
Very easy to use and a lot of fun—especially when adding multiple GIFs at once! The creator is also extremely helpful and responsive.
incredible software, the best thing is that it allows you to put whatever you want as a gif/pet and it helps a lot so that you can configure the fps at which the gif moves and its size

It´s pretty nice! The animations that exist are enough for now at least! I hope they bring more!! 100% recommend if you have ADHD or if you need something going on in the background while you play games or watch a movie/series/anime.
The Dev is very active and will listen to you and help fix everything on the fly, 10/10 recommended!
It's pretty funny, works perfectly fine, although, if you try to load more than 2 animations the whole thing crashes. So it's best to use one or two at a time.... 2 gets very annoying.
Nice, fun and easy to use. Still have some issues but i trust the process.
It's a nice app for getting a little animated desktop buddy. Only bad thing is the "always on top" option doesn't work so my buddy is pretty much useless when I get in a game

The app has it quirks but the dev works on it so i guess it's fine.

It would be nice if, when the app launches, it doesn't stay on top of everyting untill it loads.
If you love goofy and cool stuff on your screen, then get this program. It's 10x funnier to get a frag and see a little image of a character on screen twerking/dancing on screen.

The publication works correctly; unfortunately, I can’t change the monitor where I want the animation to take place. When I move it to the second monitor, it gets cut off. I’ve tried using the “change layer” function, but nothing appears. I hope they update it soon.
This is a fun thing to add, i love it. it was hard at first but then i got showed how to set it up, its really hard i find to find out how to use it but once you know how its goated
This is the most adorable perfect application right on steam. it stands right with wallpaper engine for sure a must have <3

it's a bit buggy but you can definitely enjoy it

negative.review:
Terrible! 
- VERY user unfriendy
- Nothing saves, have to reapply every restart
- Lags games and stays RUNNING in steam and discord at all times.
- Animations constantly freeze and require manual restart and placement again.

The developer deleted my steam discussion addressing these issues. Very shady. 
Probably the most useless thing ive ever tried on steam. 

0 out of 10.
horribly unoptimized, overall not user friendly, and terrible
after the updates happend i cannot drag the wallpaper around it just stuck at the center of my monitor
Installed and try it out but nothing works even after downloading the animation, nothing appear on the animation menu. Luckily I manage to refund the product as its not worth $3.

Software is very buggy, Can't change language and save, it always starts up with random language, also the animations i downloaded and deleted are still running somehow and they don't show up in main menu, i tried restarting and everything but those animation that i have already deleted are still running on my screen every time i launch the app, i am sorry but i am applying for refund.

fun little gimmick, but not optimized at all. Crashes constantly, writes some updates with 600kB(????) and more issues that make it basically unusable.

May be worth to revisit in a year, but at this point its not in a state that I'd recommend it to someone
fun to have but has too many issues. crashes every few clicks and lags games
it broke so many times i cant even count it anymore, dont even work at all on a 3060 ti, crazy

Although 3 different interfaces are available, their interfaces are very user friendly, the modern version is very slow or does not work, the dumbed-down versions do not work well with some functions
I don't know how powerful a CPU is required for the modern version (because I only have an I5 6500 CPU), but I find it quite slow.

Honestly, for average users (who don't stream) I don't think it makes any sense.

i would like to give a good review but it keeps defaulting to afrikaans language and when i set it to english, shutdown the program, and start it again english doesn't persist. i've tried a bunch of times and nothing is resolving the issue.

Can't believe something so simple can crash so many times and refuses to update in real-time...
Please do not waste your money, this thing barely works, either won't change the png/gif you selected, will either crash, or will play the animation at hyperspeed. The UI is super messy too, what a let down.
This software crashes too much and uses too much RAM. The user-interface is also very confusing. I could probably make a better app myself.

The language setting is useless as the application boots in a seemingly random language, then tells you to restart it once you try to select a new language, only to ignore the language you selected and continue to boot in a different language. The workshop lets you look at what you want with hope and excitement only to b!tch slap you across the face with disappointment when EVERY SINGLE ONE of the community made gifs fail to download, and once you finally have enough and decide to download a crappy version of the gif from the internet and work around the menus being in German or Greek, it loads the gif, works for a split second, then crashes. I need a lot more than a refund to afford therapy to deal with the anger this stupid application gave me.
Dont trust instagram guys its the worst 3 dollars ive ever spent
Please take care of this app the idea is great but its pretty unpolished.
it has a lot of bugs, hope they fix it later
Lags, crash, UI/UX like piece of sh...  i think i gonna dev the same apps for do betters ....
Keeps crashing before i even get to try to use it.. avoid.

I understand this is a new thing and that most likely a solo project. I like it, it's simple as it is. But this is my review on it as a basic user, Idk how to even code or make any of this and I explored only of what I understood in the main menu.

Firstly it feels like its way too unoptimised, when loading an gif it takes a bit and feels like its going to crash.
The start up has a massive popup that you cannot minimise on your screen.
The settings for gifs don't save, for example when I had 2 gifs from workshop loaded they had different speeds so I had to lower the frames for ones that are faster, but when you want to load in another gif you need to once again change it to match.

Improvements that I think could be made.
- Optimization of the software so it doesn't want to feel like freezing or its going to crash
- The splash screen when loading show be able to be minimized or make it small in a corner
- Allow the changes made to gifs like size or speed be saved to each one (could also add like scrolls of buttons)
- From what I found you can only spawn primary and then dupes, it would be better if there were like drop down folders that have slots for each gif so it'd be possible to modify each one without interacting with other gifs.

This is just my personal thoughts on software, I like what it is but at the moment it's not really worth getting, I will be refunding it for now and keep my eye on it just in case it becomes an abandonded project willingly or not. If it does improve in the future an edit will be made, I will leave this till around the same time next year or if big changes have been made addressing the issues.
Don't buy it its a waste of money tried it for less then 30 minutes and it just doesn't work at all don't waste the $3 on this buy something else instead
doesnt work... dont waste your money on it
i couldn’t even boot it up lmfao
